type1_missing.reasoning: Statistics Bar with Total tasks count, Completed tasks count, and Completion percentage is completely missing from dashboard
Client-side validation for email format on login page is not implemented - spec requires it
Client-side password minimum 6 characters validation on registration page is not implemented
Structured error response format with error.code and error.message is not implemented in auth endpoints - they return simple string errors
Required error codes MISSING_FIELDS, INVALID_EMAIL, WEAK_PASSWORD, EMAIL_EXISTS, and INVALID_CREDENTIALS are not implemented

type2_incorrect.reasoning: Task title validation is 50 characters max instead of specified 100 characters max
Tasks sorted by creation date in ascending order (oldest first) instead of newest first as specified
Session cookie expiry set to current time (no actual expiry) instead of 7-day expiry
Session cookie missing maxAge setting - spec requires 7-day expiry to be enforced
Dashboard displays mock user data 'User' instead of fetching actual user name from session/database

type3_extraneous.reasoning: Admin dashboard page not mentioned in specification - shows user statistics table
Priority selector (low/medium/high) not specified in requirements - tasks should only have title
Priority indicator display not specified in requirements
Priority parameter handling in POST endpoint not specified in API requirements
Priority parameter passed to task creation not in specification
cn utility function for class merging not mentioned in specification
